Manual Operation¶

The telescope can be operated manually for commissioning, testing or observation. To enable manual operation: * Turn the power switch on the main panel to “ON”. * Press “START” to start the hydraulic system. * On the pendant control turn the manual key switch to “ON”.

The manual operation overrides any remote command.

The selector switch (1-15) enables the individual components on the telescope. * “ENABLE” enables the drive. * “RESET” disables the drive or resets the error. * Buttons that can be pressed are lighted up. * When a limit switch is reached, the respective button is disabled.
